description: This drink is a perfect way to get out of the doldrums and get back into the swing of life. The name comes from its resemblance to an old mission bell tower, making for a beautiful presentation. Try this drink now for a fantastic experience!
keywords: How to Make Mission Bell Cocktail
name: Mission Bell

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish and serve.
